tool_description: A reverse email search conducted at EmailSherlock.com can help determine the identity of the owner of an unknown address that shows up in your inbox. You can also use this free email search service to learn more about an address you found in your address book or perhaps in connection with an online ad you're considering responding to.
name: Email Search by EmailSherlock
title: Email Search by EmailSherlock

api_list.name: EmailSherlock

required_parameters.name: client_ref
required_parameters.description: IP address of the client sending the request
